title: Hailey Bieber reveals THIRD dress during Justin Bieber nuptials
text:
Hailey Baldwin wore a white off-the-shoulder lace gown when she wed Justin Bieber in South Carolina on Monday in front of over 150 guests.

Later the 22-year-old Vogue model switched into a white halter dress.

But later it became obvious that the beauty had slipped into a third dress, this one a plunging curve-hugging silky number that could pass for a negligee. The frock strongly resembles the satin wonder that fashion publicist Carolyn Bessette wore when she wed John F Kennedy Jr in 1996.

A lovely look: Hailey Baldwin was seen in a third dress at her Monday wedding to Justin Bieber in this image shared by the singer's manager Scooter Braun

Familiar feel: The frock strongly resembles the satin wonder that fashion publicist Carolyn Bessette wore when she wed John F Kennedy Jr in 1996

These new images were shared by Bieber's manager Scooter Braun on Instagram but then quickly taken down.

It is the only look at the third dress so far.

When Hailey went to the church at the Montage Palmetto Bluffs in South Carolina on Monday, she was in a box with a white tent around it to prevent photographer's from getting a good look at her wedding gown.

A very alluring look: The dress showed off her chest and had very thin straps; the number also hugged her cover girl curves

The dynamic duo: Here Bessette and Kennedy Jr are seen in 1996; they died in a plane crash in July 1999 off Martha's Vineyard in Massachusetts

But Page Six published images of Baldwin in her wedding gown from the chest up.

There was also a veil placed back on her head with her hair up and diamond Tiffany & Co earrings worth $123,000 on. Bieber wore a black tuxedo and bow tie with a white shirt.

It is likely that she will reveal her gown for a magazine cover in the near future like Vogue or Vanity Fair.

Dinner dress: Hailey has been seen, however, in a halter dress as she kissed her husband

So chic: The dress had a long white strap down her bare back

A better look: Here the siren is seen with the dress as well; they are also flashing their wedding bands for the first time

Royal influence: The dress looks like the same Stella McCartney gown Meghan Markle wore during reception dinner at Frogmore Cottage with Prince Harry

Hailey has been seen, however, in a halter dress that looks like the same Stella McCartney gown Meghan Markle wore during reception dinner at Frogmore Cottage.

This isn't the first time Hailey has copied a look from the British royal family.

In September she dressed as the late Princess Diana for a fashion magazine.

he night before the wedding, Hailey wore a romantic, off-the-shoulder mini dress.

It was custom-made by Vivienne Westwood. In a statement, Westwood explained 'the gown was made with organically-produced, eco-friendly and cruelty-free peace silk — which allows the silk butterfly to live beyond the cocoon.'
description: Hailey Baldwin wore a white halter gown when she wed Justin Bieber on Monday. But the next day it became obvious that the 22-year-old Vogue model had switched into another dress.
